attributes.action: Quarantine All Arrivals at UK Airports
attributes.additional_details: Because it is putting more lives at risk, it is unfair on the population that are isolating , losing their living , dying , unfair on NHS Staff that have not got adequate protection , it is manslaughter by the government allowing non tested people into the UK, gross negligence to its citizens. Disastrous to our economy, it is simply another complete failure by the UK government and needs to stop immediately. Protect the UK you are failing us.
attributes.background: Stop letting people into the UK without proper testing for Corona Virus and a 14 day Quarantine being period imposed. We demand our government to do everything they can to protect their citizens. How can they impose lockdown yet let people freely enter the UK, stop it now.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action.

Close down all UK airports & seaports to prevent further spreading of Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

Close the Borders of the United Kingdom to Prevent the Spread of Coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309332

Enforce a 14 day quarantine on all new arrivals to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312500

Start screening every person who enters UK for Coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301188
